title: Active Directory Password Reset Procedure
content: Verify user identity via MFA or security questions. In Active Directory Users and Computers, locate the user, reset the password with a temporary one, force change at next logon, confirm login. Document the change in PSA.

title: Windows Server High CPU Troubleshooting
content: Check running processes in Task Manager or Get-Process. Identify runaway process. If safe, restart the service. If OS appears stuck and service restart fails, schedule a controlled reboot out of hours. Capture event logs and metrics for post-mortem.

title: Backup Failure Investigation
content: Review the backup job logs to identify root cause (network, storage, credentials, snapshot). Verify last successful restore point. Communicate RPO/RTO impact to customer. Re-run job after fix and confirm backup integrity with a test restore.

title: Globex SQL Backup SOP
content: For Globex SQL-PRD-01, check Veeam job 'GLOBEX-SQL-DAILY'. If last successful backup is < 24h, communicate reduced risk. Fix storage or credential issues, then re-run the job. If restore chain is broken, escalate to L3 immediately.
